title: City in the sun
creator_credit: Alasdair Loch and Australian news and Information Bureau
brief_description: Inspired by Arne Sucksdorff’s “Manniskor i Stad” (Rhythm of a city), this film reflects the mood of a day in the life of Sydney, New South Wales, from morning until night.
creator_credit_for_label: Alasdair Loch and Australian news and Information Bureau
